question: [Explain] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.

qas.question: [Explain] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.
[Check] English: State how many samples were used in total based on the histogram.
[Explain] Italiano: Riporta how many entries fall inside the modal bin dal istogramma.
